import en from"./i18n";export function validateEmail(email){if(!email){return en.ERRORS.EMPTY_EMAIL;}//Check email regex
var emailRegex=/^\w+([.-]?\w+)*@\w+([.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/;if(!emailRegex.test(email)){return en.ERRORS.INVALID_EMAIL;}}export function validatePassword(password){if(!password){return en.ERRORS.EMPTY_PASSWORD;}}export function validateEmailPassword(email,password){var msg=validateEmail(email);if(msg){return msg;}return validatePassword(password);}
